name: Surprise Frenzy
description:
====================== SURPRISE FRENZY =====================
It's Christmas day, and you have a lot of presents to open ! Try to open as much as possible before the end of the timer !

The game comes with a save system. You can collect 27 different items, and keep your progression, so keep collecting !

How can you tear them up ? Easy : solve the QTEs in time ! Best solve, more score, more time, more gifts !

==========================CREDITS =========================
Art and Artistic Direction : Florian Ortega
Game Development : Yohann Degli Esposti

Music : The Healtey Brothers on youtube ! (youtube.com/user/HeatleyBros)

========================== INFOS===========================
Made in 36 hours for the Yogcast GameJam 2020. Made with Unity.
